Prohibiting implementation of
			 Federal Data Services Hub under Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act for

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2837 IH: To prohibit for a one-year period beginning September 30, 2013, the implementation, operation, and coordination of a Federal Data Services Hub or any similar database system for determining or verifying eligibility under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
